title: November Cotton Flower - best describes technique

content.question: Which best describes the technique used in lines 4-8 (“the branch...ground”)?

choices.label: Details of agricultural setbacks provide historical context.
Accounts of successive catastrophes establish the poem’s central meaning.
Descriptions of hardships among humans mirror those in the animal world.
Examples of dearth in nature accumulate to provide emphasis.

content.answer: Examples of dearth in nature accumulate to provide emphasis.

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
